title: On Quantum Of Quota For Women, States Should...: MK Stalin
comments: Giving reservation to women in a country when women are considered lower than men but men need them is an insult. Women don’t need reservations. They are more powerful than men. And why aren’t people talking about Trans Horizontal Reservation.
We need sub reservation, Hindu, Christian, Muslim, Jain, Buddhist, Parsi, Atheist woman and further SC/ST, MBC, BC as well.
Isn't Stalin trying to become the next PM? How many support Stalin for PM?

I wish he was, problem with Dravidian parties have always been their insular focus on Tamil issues only. If it was say at least trying to expand just to southern states for now, a better representative of southern Indian issues could emerge.
